title: Playlist Creator
description: Front-End Web Application that utilizes the Spotify API to allow users to search songs, save and unsave songs, and create playlists on their Spotify Account

title: Kiss Anime
description: Full-Stack Progressive Web Application allowing users to search for Anime and add it to their watch list + comment/reply to comments and add Friends

title: Deep Thoughts
description: Full-Stack Web Application allowing users to add friends, comment, and reply to comments. Utilizes GraphQl and Material UI. Fully Responsive.

title: Travel Tunes
description: Front-End project that utilizes two APIs to present user with weather results for specified location along with a random gif and currated song to match the weather.

title: Watchlist
description: Full-Stack team project utilizing MySQL and user authentication via bcrypt to allow users to save show and movie data to their accounts

title: Social-Network API
description: Back-End project utizling MongoDB and Mongoose. This project is not deployed. View route functionality demo by clicking 'LIVE SITE.'
